item.title: 这款宾利对隐形财富并不感兴趣。它看起来就像 Bentayga 一直向往的超豪华 SUV。

item.title: 一位来自芝加哥的设计师被她的客户委以重任，这位客户刚刚在佛罗里达州购买了一套汽车公寓。"他让我设计一个最酷的男人洞穴"。
item.description:
A Chicago-based designer was assigned a monumental task by her client, who had just purchased a car condo in Florida. “He asked me to design the coolest man cave ever.” https://t.co/qIBB17bOl5 https://t.co/qIBB17bOl5

item.title: 众所周知，豪宅业主会在时尚厨房、定制装饰和艺术品上挥金如土。但是，他们越来越多地将注意力和预算转向你看不到的东西：空气。
item.description:
Luxury homeowners are known to splurge on sleek kitchens, custom décor and art. But they are increasingly turning their attention, and budgets, to something you can't see: air. https://t.co/WeJQLcyISq https://t.co/WeJQLcyISq

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 伊丽莎白-卡尔是美国第一个通过体外受精技术出生的婴儿，她一直是生育技术可能性的生动象征。
item.description:
Elizabeth Carr, the first baby born by in vitro fertilization in the U.S., has always been a living symbol of fertility technology’s possibilities.

Now, the 42-year-old is the face of its challenges. https://t.co/rTJhgF13jr https://t.co/rTJhgF13jr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在彭萨科拉市，一幢拥有泰坦尼克号房间的海滨住宅以 299.9 万美元的价格上市，房间内设有泰坦尼克号邮轮酒吧的复制品和一个设定为邮轮沉没时间的时钟。

item.title: 十年前，在比弗利伍德花二三十万美元就能买到一栋房子。现在呢？"你不可能以低于300万美元的价格买到任何一条黄金街道上的地皮"。
item.description:
A decade ago, you could buy a house in Beverlywood for $200,000 to $300,000. Now? “You can’t buy just land on any of the prime streets for less than $3 million.” https://t.co/siQ3sbFrw6 https://t.co/siQ3sbFrw6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 价值 10 亿美元的艺术收藏品本应平均分配给一个家庭的三个子女。后来，遗嘱被更改了。八年过去了，至少 18 起诉讼，传奇仍在继续。
item.description:
A $1 billion art collection was to be divided equally among one family's three children. Then a will was changed. Eight years and at least 18 lawsuits later, the saga continues. https://t.co/jLgsZIg8uf https://t.co/jLgsZIg8uf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一位设计专家为被称为 "蜗居 "的家庭休养所提供的秘诀："把原本可能被认为是乏善可陈的房间，变成家里最好的空间"。
item.description:

item.title: 重大新闻正式宣布：拜登总统和唐纳德-特朗普获得提名。自1956年以来的首次总统选举复赛现在开始。
item.description:

item.title: 艾米-舒默（Amy Schumer）的喜剧生涯是从一个并不有趣的地方开始的。"我早期的焦虑和幽默很大程度上来自于缺乏稳定。我的父母很爱我，但事情总是在不断地改变"。
item.description:
Amy Schumer's start to comedy came from a not-so-funny place. "Much of my early anxiety and humor came from a lack of stability. My parents loved me, but things kept chipping away." https://t.co/F8OeFBN3rb https://t.co/F8OeFBN3rb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 非洲最大的野生动物园之一正在努力控制一种入侵物种：携带相机的人类。"感觉就像迪斯尼乐园"
item.description:
One of Africa’s great safari spots is struggling to control an invasive species: camera-toting humans. “It feels like Disney World.” https://t.co/diMj6bWvPw https://t.co/diMj6bWvPw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 🎧 听：在今天的《日报》播客中，@estherfung 将解释在俄亥俄州东巴勒斯坦发生重大列车脱轨事故一年后，诺福克南方公司首席执行官为何有一些不太可能的盟友支持他。
item.description:
🎧 Listen: In today's episode of The Journal podcast, @estherfung explains why Norfolk Southern’s CEO has some unlikely allies in his corner about a year after a major train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio, prompted efforts to oust him https://t.co/LKk6URVsR1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: "Girls5Eva》主演 Busy Philipps 谈及自己小时候的怪癖："我有很强的主见，很容易迷恋自己喜欢的东西，这让其他孩子感到焦虑，他们希望我像他们一样--安静、酷。
item.description:
"Girls5Eva" star Busy Philipps on embracing her weirdness as a kid: "I had strong opinions and easily became obsessed with things I liked, which caused anxiety in other kids who wanted me to be like them—quiet and cool." https://t.co/a3VJY3FvLV https://t.co/a3VJY3FvLV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 成立海地过渡委员会为选举铺平道路的提议已经遭到了势力强大的帮派领导人的抵制，这表明该机构在努力领导国家摆脱日益加深的危机时将面临挑战
item.description:
A proposal for a Haitian transitional council to pave the way to elections has already encountered resistance from powerful gang leaders, a sign of the challenges the body would face in its effort to lead the country out of a deepening crisis https://t.co/nYUQFOlxuF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 评论乡村女歌手凯西-马斯格雷夫斯（Kacey Musgraves）的新专辑《更深的井》（Deeper Well）是一张反思性的专辑，但往往给人感觉过于沉静和空闲，无法给人留下深刻印象。
item.description:
Review: Country singer-songwriter Kacey Musgraves delivers "Deeper Well," a reflective new album that often feels too hushed and spare to leave an impression https://t.co/6rsaXoAtiD https://t.co/6rsaXoAtiD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在笔记本电脑前工作了一天，脖子酸痛吗？像 PowerDot 2.0 这样的 TENS 电疗仪可以利用电子肌肉刺激来缓解疼痛和酸痛。
item.description:

item.title: 如果你想活到 100 岁，健康的生活习惯只能帮你到这一步。以下是科学家们现在对活到 100 岁的了解。
item.description:
